title: Call me Coco Champion
description: Tackle your workouts with confidence in performance running shoes and stylish clothes from New Balance.
cleaned_text: Performance with each step. Click to learn more Fresh Foam delivers our most cushioned experience for incredible comfort. Style & comfort at an affordable price. Shop affordable shoes under $100 that elevate your everyday style and performance. Free returns and free shipping on orders $75+ Enjoy free shipping on orders $75+. If you aren't completely happy with your purchase, simply return it within 45 days from purchase. Returns must be in new condition, in the state you received them. Non-returnable items cannot be returned. Congratulations to Coco Gauff on your first major tournament championship.
